thread.title: BRIEF-‍Cannabis Wheaton says will acquire 15 mln common shares of Inner Spirit​

title: BRIEF-‍Cannabis Wheaton says will acquire 15 mln common shares of Inner Spirit​
text:
Jan 9 (Reuters) - Cannabis Wheaton Income Corp:
* ‍CANNABIS WHEATON INCOME CORP. ANNOUNCES STRATEGIC INVESTMENT AND ALLIANCE WITH INNER SPIRIT HOLDINGS LTD​
* ‍COMPANY WILL ACQUIRE 15 MILLION COMMON SHARES OF INNER SPIRIT​
* ‍COMPANY WILL PROVIDE INNER SPIRIT WITH CASH PAYMENT OF $350,000
* ‍CO WILL PROVIDE INNER SPIRIT WITH 674,418 COMMON SHARES OF COMPANY, EACH WITH ISSUE PRICE OF $2.15 PER COMMON SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
